title: GF that steals a car and kills you both in a crash

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Steal a car from another player. Succeed if they have an attack power greater than none, unlocking the second ability.
- **Locked, until the first ability succeeds.** Choose a player to ride with. Since you crash with them in your car, you and the targeted player are hit with an Unstoppable attack

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - After stealing a car, you gain basic defense
